title: Home Alone and Kimchi (with Majandra Delfino)
itunes:title: Home Alone and Kimchi (with Majandra Delfino)
description:
While SuChin is finally out of her month-long shopping freeze, guest host Dr. MD MD (Majandra Delfino) is literally freezing in the Northeast. So it’s no surprise that both brought similar items that add a little heat to your week. Plus, the things their kids inspired that now make their lives easier. 

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • Majandra’s cookbook is Cook Korean: A Comic Book by Robin Ha
  • SuChin’s cookbook is The Korean by Africa Yoon
  • Majandra got this cordless mixer from Food52
  • Her breakfast bowl was inspired by the one at Republique Cafe on Le Brea
  • SuChin, Soe, and Kulap love Sleep Crown (get 15% off with code AddtoCart) 

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
